scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web,api-codegen,web-codegen -c blue,magenta,green,yellow 'cd api && bun run --watch bin/dev.ts' 'cd web && bun run watch' 'cd api && bun graphql-codegen --watch' 'cd web && bun graphql-codegen --watch'
scripts.dev:test: cd api && ENV_TYPE=test PORT=4445 bun run bin/dev-test.ts
scripts.typecheck: cd api && bun typecheck && cd ../web && bun typecheck
scripts.lint: cd api && bun lint && cd ../web && bun lint
